import Fruit from "../components/Fruit"; import FruitForm from "../components/FruitForm"; import Btn from "../components/Btn"; import {useState} from "react"; import {OrbitControls} from "@react-three/drei"; import {Canvas} from "@react-three/fiber"; import Cube from "../components/Cube"; export default function Home({fruits, setFruits}) { //state //comportements const handleDelete = (id) => { const fruitsCopy = [...fruits] const fruitsCopyUpdated = fruitsCopy.filter(fruit => fruit.id !== id) setFruits(fruitsCopyUpdated) } const handleAdd = (ajouterFruit) => { const fruitsCopy = [...fruits] fruitsCopy.push(ajouterFruit) setFruits(fruitsCopy) } return
